H0.text: Rabies is the disease that is caused by a bacterium.

H1.text: Influenza is a disease caused by a bacterium.

H2.text: Strep throat is a disease caused by a bacterium.

H3.text: Chicken pox is a disease caused by a bacterium, as asked in the question "Which of these diseases is caused by a bacterium?"

A4.text: Streptococcus pyogenes, a gramâ€‘positive, group A streptococcus, is the pathogen responsible for strep throat.
